rows.label: bf05200100_0002
rows.name:
"No More Blades, No More War"...
What does that mean?

rows.label: bf05200100_0004
rows.name: It's a protest against the Holy See's Blade policies.

rows.label: bf05200100_0006
rows.name:
The refugees have been actively 
doing this since about last year.

rows.label: bf05200100_0008
rows.name: Whoa! Where did you pop up from?

rows.label: bf05200100_0010
rows.name:
I mean, when did you get 
here from the Cloud Sea?

rows.label: bf05200100_0012
rows.name: Did Blades do something bad perhaps?

rows.label: bf05200100_0014
rows.name:
The Holy See alone is responsible for managing the cores 
produced in each country and balancing their supply.

rows.label: bf05200100_0016
rows.name: Though occasionally folks like Morph and Bahn show up too.

rows.label: bf05200100_0018
rows.name: So the Holy See itself is the cause of war?

rows.label: bf05200100_0020
rows.name: That's one way of looking at it, at least.

rows.label: bf05200100_0022
rows.name:
Drivers and Blades are just 
one part of military strength, right?

rows.label: bf05200100_0024
rows.name: But getting them to understand that isn't easy.

rows.label: bf05200100_0026
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: bf05200100_0028
rows.name: There are a lot of Gulan refugees.

rows.label: bf05200100_0030
rows.name:
From the Gulan War ten years ago, I suppose.
They must have fled from that conflict.

rows.label: bf05200100_0032
rows.name: They're really a strange bunch, honestly.

rows.label: bf05200100_0034
rows.name:
We give them homes, we feed them,
and then they complain.

rows.label: bf05200100_0036
rows.name:
"When food and clothing are sufficient, people 
know courtesy"...That's a lie, isn't it?

rows.label: bf05200100_0038
rows.name:
When humans get comfortable,
they start thinking unnecessary things.

rows.label: bf05200100_0040
rows.name: They don't look at what's beyond their control,

rows.label: bf05200100_0042
rows.name: because it's easier to attack what's close at hand.

rows.label: bf05200100_0044
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf05200100_0046
rows.name: Looks like you want to say something?

rows.label: bf05200100_0048
rows.name: It's not like that.

rows.label: bf05200100_0050
rows.name: "Not like that" meaning what?

rows.label: bf05200100_0060
rows.name:
Everyone knows that Superbia's Divine Beast
doesn't have much time left.

rows.label: bf05200100_0070
rows.name: So what? Is that why they're stationed in Gula?

rows.label: bf05200100_0080
rows.name: Our population is larger than Invidia's.

rows.label: bf05200100_0090
rows.name:
But the resources to sustain them are
overwhelming insufficient...

rows.label: bf05200100_0100
rows.name: You're quite perceptive for your age.

rows.label: bf05200100_0110
rows.name:
That's because I've seen a lot 
while working as a salvager.

rows.label: bf05200100_0120
rows.name:
I understand that the world 
can't run on ideals alone.

rows.label: bf05200100_0130
rows.name: So that's why you seek Eden?

rows.label: bf05200100_0140
rows.name: Is that wrong?

rows.label: bf05200100_0150
rows.name: No. I was just reminded how young you are.

rows.label: bf05200100_0160
rows.name:
But still, compared to those who just wave around 
ideals and shout about them...

rows.label: bf05200100_0170
rows.name: He's way better, right?

rows.label: bf05200100_0180
rows.name: Indeed, his drive for action is worthy of respect.

rows.label: bf05200100_0190
rows.name: Ahh, I'm just stumbling my way forward.
